creator: eadgbe10@gvtc.com
text:
LoadModule jserv_module modules/ApacheModuleJServ.dll

The Dll was copied from the JSERV installation but Apache won't start
with this line. I commented out all new lines and then uncomment
this one and it fails.  Apache 2.0.47 Dosen't like this.

My PHP and MYSQL are all working fine and have been for some time.
I'm just trying to add the JSERV... (From the Install packages 1.1.2 or
something like that... the new one!  I matched all required version.

creator: eadgbe10@gvtc.com
text:
Created attachment 13159
httpd.conf with Load of ApacheModuleJSERV failing

creator: chip@force-elite.com
text:
This is a problem in Apache JServ, not Apache HTTPd.
Most likely you want Tomcat 4 or 5, not JServ:
http://jakarta.apache.org/tomcat/

Thanks for using Apache httpd.
